item.title: EP 27 - My Stepmom's The Terminator!
item.itunes:title: My Stepmom's The Terminator!
item.description:
Today we look at sex robots who spend more time in the living room than the bedroom, and examine the future of the war on crime.

Patreon 

https://www.patreon.com/user?u=18482113

MERCH STORE!!!
https://tinyurl.com/y8zam4o2

The battle between law enforcement and criminals is a storied one. Both side are constantly have to one-up each other to stay effective. But with new developments in DNA, how much longer can the crooks stay competitive?

Also, are sex robots bad role models? Now that models are being built with "family friendly" modes that leave the dirty talk in the bedroom, is it damaging for a child to even be in a house where one of these are owned?

How a Genealogy Website Led to the Alleged Golden State Killer

https://www.theatlantic.com/science/archive/2018/04/golden-state-killer-east-area-rapist-dna-genealogy/559070/

DNA leads to arrest in a second Washington State cold case involving a murdered young girl

http://www.foxnews.com/us/2018/06/23/dna-leads-to-arrest-in-second-washington-state-cold-case-involving-murdered-young-girl.html

The Mammoth Book Of True Crime

https://amzn.to/2LjSjRX

DIRTY DROIDS Sex robot makers blasted over sick ‘family friendly’ love dolls that STEAL husbands and scar kids

https://www.thesun.co.uk/tech/6760656/sex-robots-family-friendly-dolls/

Listen to the daily podcast anywhere you listen to podcasts!

------------------------------------------------

Logo Art By Ash Black
Opening Song: "Atlantis Attacks"
Closing Song: "Bella Royale"
Music By Dr. Huxxxtable
Hood River

http://www.DeadRabbit.com

Email: DeadRabbitRadio@gmail.com

Twitter: @DeadRabbitRadio

Facebook: www.Facebook.com/DeadRabbitRadio

Paranormal, Conspiracy, and True Crime news as it happens! Jason Carpenter breaks the stories they'll be talking about tomorrow, assuming the world doesn't end today.

All Contents Of This Podcast Copyright Jason Carpenter 2018 - 2020
